snippet.title: LEGO Fortnite Brick Life Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Make new friends, explore the sights, land your dream job, and move into your new home in LEGO® Fortnite Brick Life! It’s an all-new social roleplay experience in the LEGO Fortnite universe, launching on December 12!

Learn more in our blog: https://fn.gg/Brick-Life

How to play LEGO Fortnite Brick Life

Wondering where you need to go to start your city life? When you head into Discover, you’ll now find LEGO Fortnite listed as its own unique category within Fortnite. 

There, you’ll find LEGO Fortnite Brick Life, as well as LEGO Fortnite Odyssey (the original LEGO Fortnite experience, now with all-new features, characters, an electrifying villain, and a new name!) and any creator-made or LEGO Group LEGO Islands. Simply select “LEGO Fortnite Brick Life” to start building your new city lifestyle!

#LEGOFortniteBrickLife #LEGOFortnite #LFBrickLife

Find LEGO Fortnite on:
X (Formerly Twitter): https://twitter.com/LEGOFortnite
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/LEGOFortnite
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@legofortnite
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LEGO.Fortnite
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/LEGOFortnite
Snapchat: https://www.snapchat.com/add/legofortnite
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/LEGOfortnite/

Discover LEGO Fortnite: https://www.lego.com/en-gb/themes/fortnite/about
And join LEGO Insiders and link to your Epic account: https://www.lego.com/en-gb/insiders/home

#LEGOFortnite
